data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe the inside of your closet. What do the contents say about your life? What is one item you want to add to your closet in the next year and why?
data.answer: When you have a chance to take a glance at my closet, you would be amazed at how much content I already have put into it. For me, I just want a little reminder that I already have so much. I’m so lucky, and my daily attitude should reflect that. If I want to go to the mall with a friend one night to shop for fun, that’s OK, but I’ll know that I don’t need another pair of jeans no matter what they cost because I already have five! It might surprise you, but I’m not that big of a shopper anyway. My thing is I want to make sure that I really wear everything I own, or I should be donating it. If I do buy something new, it should be something I really need. And the big goal is to be thankful for what I already have. If I were to add another item into my closet in the next year, I suppose I would get a nice-looking cap, probably a black one as I already got a white one in there. I would like a black cap because I really don’t want to wash, blow-dry, and then style my hair on a daily basis. It takes a fair amount of time, and I am worried that those hair-styling products will somewhat damage my hair. I picked black because black goes with every other color. How lazy I am! (242 words)
